mapper.update: update user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, call = #{call,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jiluzt = #{jiluzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select userId, name, sex, birthday, call, jiluzt from user
